channel.title: Testing on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in Testing on Greg Herlein

item.title: Don't Miss the Train!
item.description: The AI train has left the station. Some of us are on board, generating entire modules from specs. Others are still on the platform debating whether the train is even real. Four smart people wrote about this shift this past week. They all agree on what it means. And I agree with them.
